EmailTemplate.subject: The Public Cloud Guide - New Clouds, Same Challenges
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-public-cloud-guide?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=public-cloud-guide&utm_content=03102017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, A growing number of IT leaders are transforming IT’s unfortunate reputation as a cost-center into one of a competitive advantage. In doing so they acknowledged that IT cannot be a gate-keeper. Their teams must enable applications teams to deliver on business needs—or they’ll be replaced. The public cloud promises many things, but there remain three key elements to consider as you transform IT: Performance, Cost, and Agility.
Download this whitepaper <[[http://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-public-cloud-guide?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=public-cloud-guide&utm_content=03102017]]> as we dive into:
- The Journey to the Cloud, Any Cloud
- Performance, it's still your problem
- Cost: "Cloud Scale" Still Gets Expensive
- Agility: Easily Talked About, Not Easily Done
- Cloudy With a Chance of Vendor Lock In - Choosing the Right Cloud
<[[http://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-public-cloud-guide?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=public-cloud-guide&utm_content=03102017]]> -The Turbonomic Team
